description:
The list of 1000s of Excel shortcut keys are NOT to be memorized. It will torture your grey cells! So we have used industry practices and our Ninja Instructor's experience to handpick those shortcut keys which will meet your work requirements, make you look like an accomplished Excel Ninja.

This course is best suited for MS Excel 2007-2016 (Windows PC). Not suited for Mac.

The best part is you can learn them in 30 minutes and start showing off at your office. Join now for a Complete No-Nonsense Course on Excel Shortcuts.
title: Learn Excel Ninja Shortcuts
